ConfigurationÂ¶

group asmjit_config

Contains macros that can be redefined to fit into any project.

Defines

ASMJIT_OS_POSIX

Macro that is declared if AsmJit is compiled for unix like operating system.

ASMJIT_ASSERT(_Exp_)

Assertion macro. Default implementation calls asmjit::assertionFailed() function.
